CommitComments.CommitComment: Added adapter from Chatroom to Model for room deletion.
Prevent getting chatrooms in which the user is already in revised.
Prevent getting chatrooms in which the user is already in.
Updated accept to get the a correct yes or no.
Displays an error message when a chatroom name is already in use.
When a message is sent, the text box field with clear with an empty string.
If no text is added in the name field for a chatroom then a tab is not created.
Added the method to append text to frame.
